name: Reference - Firmware Behavior Analysis VIPER
x_kb_abstract: Recent research demonstrates that malware can infect peripherals' firmware in a typical x86 computer system, e.g., by exploiting vulnerabilities in the firmware itself or in the firmware update tools. Verifying the integrity of peripherals' firmware is thus an important challenge. We propose software-only attestation protocols to verify the integrity of peripherals' firmware, and show that they can detect all known software-based attacks.
x_kb_author: Yanlin Li, Jonathan M. McCune, Adrian Perrig
x_kb_reference_title: VIPER: Verifying the Integrity of PERipherals' Firmware
